1.1
```{r}
f1 <-function(x) {
  if (length(x)<3){
    "error"
  } else
  paste0(x[1],",",x[2]," and ",x[3])
}

f1(c("a","b","c"))

```

f2 <-function(start) {
  end=as.Date(now())
  floor(as.numeric(difftime(end, start, unit="weeks")) / 52.25)
}
